title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. O, pt. 92 - Infection Control Requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. O, pt. 92 - Infection Control Requirements

State Regulations

Subpart 92-1 - Physicians, Registered Physician Assistants And Specialist Assistants: Required Course Work Or Training In Infection Control And Barrier Precautions Every Four Years (§ 92-1.1 to 92-1.10)

Subpart 92-2 - Physicians, Registered Physician Assistants And Specialist Assistants Required Use Of Infection Control Practices (§ 92-2.1)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. O, pt. 92

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §§230-a, 238

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
